Introduction: Oh, you're the gentleman that just moved in.^Oh, you're the person who just moved in.#$b#It's a pleasure meeting you.#$b#I'm David.#$e#I hope we both have a swell time getting to know each other.
GreenRain: Were you just out in the rain? Let me check your skin for a reaction.#$b#Hmm, you seem fine. Seems like this rain, whatever it is, isn't affecting anyone here.#$b#Can't be too safe, though.
GreenRainFinished: The mysterious green rain has ended.#$b#Maybe it's just me, but the valley seems happier now.
GreenRain_2: It seems like the green rain is safe.#$b#Still, maybe try not to get any in your mouth or eyes while you're outside today.
spring_Mon: Hello, @.#$e#I'm rewatching Full Metal Alchemist: Brotherhood.#$b#It's a great series.#$e#You should watch it.
spring_Tue: I think I had, like, a whole pot of coffee yesterday.#$e#So like, 3 mugs-worth of coffee.#$b#If you have a really big mug.#$e#Which I do.
spring_Wed: Cardigans are superior to most other clothing.#$e#Nay.#$b#All other clothing.#$e#You know I'm right.
spring_Thu: I need a fencing partner.#$b#My skills are getting rusty.#$b#It's the right weather for it.
spring_Fri: My grey hair?#$b#It just grows this way.#$e#It's been grey my whole life.
spring_Sat: If you're ever unsure if you're making enough rice when cooking, remember this:#$b#Think like an asian.
summer_Mon: I always make lots of cold brew in the summers.
summer_Wed: I caught Linus eating fish stew out of the trash the other day.#$b#Not that there's anything wrong with that!#$b#But that guy is a ChubbyEmu video waiting to happen.
summer_Thu: Don't forget to keep looking up.#$b#That's the mantra I live by.
summer_Fri: I'm not a big fan of social events.#$b#Still, I like to go to the pub with Ross on Fridays.#$e#We have good times.
summer_Sat: Ross has a lot of friends.#$b#Me? Not as much.#$e#But I enjoy spending time with Ross's friends.$h
summer_Sun: Today was not a good day.$s#$b#But tomorrow will surely be better.
fall_Mon: Nice shoes.#$e#They're pretty muddy, but I like your style.
fall_Tue: Elliot lets me use his piano sometimes.#$e#I like to practice my songs at his place.#$e#Do you like Clair de Lune?
fall_Thu: Hey, there.#$e#I'm thinking stroganoff for dinner.#$e#Yeah! Stroganoff!
fall_Fri: I'm feeling great today!$h#$b#Like I want to go out to the city and go clubbing!$h#$b#But maybe I'll settle for the Stardrop Saloon.
fall_Sat: How do some people just drink milk?#$b#Like just a full glass of milk. No cookies or anything.#$b#That is suspicious behavior. I can't trust anyone who can drink milk neat like that.
winter_Mon: Just beat an old Pokemon game last night.#$b#It was my 5th playthrough.
winter_Wed: Where do you think we go when we die?#$b#I like to think that my consciousness carries on, even when my body is gone.#$e#Maybe that's a little heavy for idle Wednesday conversation.$h
winter_Thu: I'm not really a fan of the snow.#$e#I used to live somewhere much colder than this.#$b#You get sick of it pretty fast.
winter_Fri: I do love to party.#$b#Not as much as I did in my younger days, though.#$e#Not that I'm old or anything.#$b#I just used to be a party animal!$h
winter_Sat: Hey, @.#$e#You've lived here in Pelican Town awhile.#$e#It's nice that you're still here.
winter_Sun: Ross let me borrow his Tarot deck.#$b#I've drawn the same card 3 days in a row. The Hermit, in the reversed position.#$e#What could it mean?$s
